description:
First time in P&G Kazakhstan history we are ready to announce great opportunity for those who want to continue education for Master’s degree and combine it with an opportunity to have P&G internship!


We are offering 2 grants for Master’s degree studies!


Grant conditions:

  • P&G will pay full study fees for 1 year professional Master’s degree program;
  • Any 1-year long Master’s degree program of 3 universities can be covered by the grant.
  • To receive the grant, candidate must pass P&G selection process:
    1. Pass Online SDA test;
    2. Pass Reasoning test;
    3. Pass interviews.
  • Successful candidate should enroll to the university Masters program by themselves and pass university requirements separately;
  • Grant holder will also take P&G internship during his/her Master studies without any additional selection step, which is paid up to 100,000 KZT gross;
  • After successful internship P&G offers full-time managerial positions for grant holders.

Requirements:
  • Kazakhstan citizenship;
  • Good level of English;
  • Strong analytic, leadership and communication skills;
  • To be able to start Master’s degree program on September 2013.

Working conditions:
  • Working schedule can be full-time or part-time, depending on study time;
  • 5 days internship with duration 2-3 month
  • Full payment of 1-1,5 year master degree tuition fees
name: P&G Kazakhstan Grants
